content.raw: I've been thinking a bit a bout the architecture of sensors and gazebo. Something that could work is moving the management of sensors from ign-senors to ign-gazebo. Ign-sensors would become a repository of sensor models. Management of the sensors would be left up to the user of ign-sensors. This idea is lacking details, but what do you all think of this approach? Are there obvious pitfalls?
